events.description: Bad news! the guards are guarding this side of the dock, maybe the secrets have been leaked out
You walk along the dockside with more than a little uneasiness in your mind
At that moment a smiling, exotic merchant came up on his way, not looking like a peddler selling the usual goods
Hello, I see you're covered in slash marks but with a martial temperament, so you must have returned in triumph
We have newly imported equipment here, and news of the shallow sea treasure!
The trader looks at you expectantly, like he's ready to rip off an external tourist
Sorry, I've got important things to do. I'll come back later when I have a chance
The trader saw that he had no chance and could only walk away in disgrace.
